website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, this well-priced model earns high marks for being durable and useful for most gardeners' needs.
pros: Surpasses the competition for having all the features gardeners love: sturdy frame in a versatile, easy-to-fold design
The garden tool pouch is a brilliant freebie
cons: Seat cushioning is on the firm side at first, but generally softens with use
Some may also find the seat positioning too high

customer_reviews.title: Garden Kneeler
customer_reviews.text: This is the third garden kneeler I have purchased. I have had a knee replacement and have severe arthritis in my lower back. I love gardening and could not do most of my planting and weeding without this handy little bench. I also use it for just about everything else u can imagine, like painting baseboards, using it as kneeler to looked for items under bed,chairs, table etc. I am not a light person, and these units hold up over time. My first one is 3 years old and going strong! They have been left out in weather at times and dirt, paint and chemicals spilled on them.
customer_reviews.author: Beamer

customer_reviews.title: Old folks friend
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and made. Perfect for an old guy like me to use in the garden but also for help getting up from mat exercises without any other support around. Sounds crazy, but you will all get old some day and this is a real friend.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Bob, MD.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different garden bench.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this garden bench! I bought this to replace my old garden bench - it is a cheap replica of my original bench. It is light weight and easier to move around but that is because it is cheaply made. The seat is quite narrow - I am a normal size 70 year old woman whose rear end did not fit on the seat. The bench is unstable - you will have to constantly be thinking about balancing yourself on the narrow seat to keep from falling over. It simply isn't safe.
customer_reviews.author: Judelake

customer_reviews.title: Garden Kneeler and Seat is OUTSTANDING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had both knees replaced (TKR = Total Knee Replacement) about 1 year ago. The Garden Kneeler is the FINEST help in getting up and down in the middle of a room/workshop/garden/yard following TKR!!!! After using one for 8 months, I ordered two more; one to keep in my Chevy Tahoe ALL THE TIME and one to give to a special friend who had partial knee replacement 13 years ago. MY ONLY SUGGESTION FOR IMPROVEMENT IS TO INSTALL 4 NON-SLIP RUBBER CUSHIONS ON EACH END OF THE METAL FRAME SO THAT THE Garden Kneeler WILL NOT SLIP ON CONCRETE FLOORS, PARTICULARLY WHEN IT IS USED AS A SEAT. JR Alexander
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: This garden seat is great! I can't use the kneeler part due to ...
customer_reviews.text: This garden seat is great ! I can't use the kneeler part due to both my knees being knee replacements. But I bought this item to have a seat higher than my 5 gallon bucket to sit on. The bucket was too low and my knees would grind and burn horribly when trying to get up. But this kneeler seat is 2.5 to 3 inches higher and helps a great deal without being too tall. Also the seat is very comfortable since it is a sturdy cushion that should last a long time with proper care.. The tool bag is quite an added bonus. Definately this is a very good investment at a low price..
customer_reviews.author: Louise Heath

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I am in the over 60 club and the kneeler is just what I needed. Very good quality and the price is right. Probably going to need a second one. My wife latched onto this one.
customer_reviews.author: SARGE

customer_reviews.title: but love to garden
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far, but I can already tell this garden kneeler is just what I needed! I have rheumatoid arthritis, but love to garden. The handles are extremely helpful to get me up off the ground. I found that the seat side is too high for gardening (I'm sure I'll use it for LOTS of other things), but if I put it in the kneeling position, I can use a short plastic step stool right over it and the handles on the kneeler really help me get up easily!! I can also keep my tools in the handy pouch. Love it thus far, THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Lazarai

customer_reviews.title: Kneeler is great, tool bag is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome...the tool bag is not useful. Once you put tools in it....it becomes top heavy and hangs at an angle between the legs. And if you need to go from kneeling to sitting...you must take the tool bag off. The velcro design is cumbersome and would have been better as a hook design for easy on off. Further the bag should be wider so not to fall between legs once the weight of tools is placed in it. Motto...do not spend extra money to get tool bag design if you can find it cheaper without the bag. I added a small bungy cord around the legs to keep bag from falling thru.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa F

customer_reviews.title: The seat broke
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Garden kneeler that I bought in the last 6 years. I was always very pleased with this product. The one that I am reviewing now fall apart the first five minutes of usage. I am 74 years old 200 pounds and I use the kneeler to kneel while gardening. This one's bottom fall apart while I kneeled. I believe this one was defective because the previous kneelers were excellent products that served me for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nikos

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: This kneeler appeared at first to be well constructed BUT, one of the welds from the side strut to handle failed during the third usage. Because it failed the opposite end also broke off. The weld that failed was due to poor penetration, ie; a cold weld or not enough spark. The only saving grace is Amazons return policy - they are replacing it with a new one. We will see if the replacement is of better quality. Stand by for further info. P.S. If Abcosport wishes to increase quality - slot the handles tubes and lengthen the struts to extend into the handle then weld. This would prevent the sudden drop brought on by a failed weld.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP, SHODDY CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it more than 5-6 hours tops, and one weld has already failed. The metal was rusty inside the weld. Other welds are also failing, My previous one (different mfr) lasted 25 years. Beware cheap, shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.author: JSBB

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction and high price.
customer_reviews.text: The construction is poor both in the quality of the materials used and the workmanship. As long as I used it as a seat in the garden it lasted. When I turned it upside-down and used it as a kneeler, it broke and could not be salvaged any part of it. I threw it out. With respect to the price, the exact same thing can be had for $19.95 at Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Constantinos Vassilarakis

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This worksfor well for work in on your knees, but the legs. fold up on me when I tried the seat side. Wast ofthe money
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The foam platform has already broke with very few kneeling uses. Very disappointed in the durability of this product as I've had one before the the spot welds broke on the last one with very few uses as well. Don't waste your money on this ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Helps save the knees !
customer_reviews.text: In my 60's, I still LOVE to garden, but find it quite hard on my knees . This helps more than a kneeling pad because it keeps one off the hard ground, and the handles/legs make it easier to get back up...then it can be flipped over to make a seat or wee table ! I love the pink and purple - I smile each time I see it. The snap-on tool holder can be handy if using it solely in the seat mode, but impractical if flipping it back and forth. Haven't tried the gloves yet. Costs way more than it should for relatively cheap and simple materials and construction, but it's the going rate.
customer_reviews.author: Blues Fan

customer_reviews.title: Makes gardening so much easier. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used it today since we finally had pretty weather. I sat on it and kneeled on it and it was perfect. Sturdy, comfortable and easy to fold for storage. I will be using this every week this summer. Great garden helper.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Garden Kneeler and Seat!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had my Garden Kneeler a few days and I'm totally thrilled with my purchase. Because of my arthritis in my back and hips I had thought about giving up my gardens. I have worked outside every day using my kneeler and have had no issues with pain. I have used it mostly in the sitting position. Having the handles helps me get to a standing position. So glad I bought it! R. Swanson
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: VERY DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: not made very well/ the one I have leans to one side! an elderly person would fall. buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. John

customer_reviews.title: To Garden Or Not
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really using this for gardening, as I live in a New York apartment....but I thought it might help me when I need to get down on my knees to find something, clean something, or unplug something....and I think it will ! It arrived very quickly, and I was delighted when I opened it to discover it is not too heavy, and there is no assembly required, just fold open the legs. The handles are very strong and lift me right up to my feet. As for using it as a seat, it is not soft enough to sit for any great length of time, so don't take it to a ball game.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Neiman

customer_reviews.title: ... would be worth it to see if it was sturdy and worked
customer_reviews.text: For the $20 I thought it would be worth it to see if it was sturdy and worked. Well, it works and works well. I am 6' and 200 lbs with arthritis in my knees so getting down on the ground is not too hard but getting up is a real problem but not with the Garden Kneeler. As a stool it is very sturdy and flipped over to kneel on the "handles" are sturdy enough to help me up with no problem. Best $20 I've spent in awhile and it was so good I bought another for my friend that works on his vehicles (and mine sometimes) every weekend and also struggles getting up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli K. Vits

customer_reviews.title: LOVE except for tool holder
customer_reviews.text: I am an agile 69 year old who needs assistance from time to time when gardening - especially getting up and down! This fits that need and is very comfortable. It also lays crosswise over a wheel burrow very well. (We have an acre of land and lots of planting beds) However, as you can see in the attached video, the holder for garden tools is useless. That was a 2nd reason to buy it so that I didn't forget where I left my tools. There should be a fix for this, but my husband, who is an engineer, stated that it is a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Judyque

customer_reviews.title: Would not consider this adequate for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8"and weigh 164 lbs. The specifications given are for someone a lot bigger than I am. I tried sitting on the bench and the legs began to collapse under me even though they were snapped into place. Then I tried kneeling on the reverse position, and the step bowed slightly as I put my weight on it. As instructed, I grabbed the two handles to get up, and the whole apparatus flipped forward. I was barely able to keep from falling on my face. It has been returned. My old foam rubber cushion will be back in service.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hillefeld

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: It is not safe. I tried kneeling on it in the house before taking to garden. When I tried to get up from kneeling it flipped over causing me to fall.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Garden Kneeler best product I have had for weeking and trimming roses.
customer_reviews.text: The Garden Kneeler and Seat works well for its intended purposes. I found it sturdy as both a seat and a kneeling platform. I have tried pads and other ways to protect the knees with limited success. This is the best thing I have found to pull weeds. The kneeling pad is comfortable and the seat also provides enough padding. I like the fact that it does fold up and can be stored in a small space. I read a review where someone had a problem pulling the mechanism that allows it to fold up but I had no such problem. It folded easily without much effort. The utility pockets are great if you are sitting and trimming roses.
customer_reviews.author: Pyewacket

customer_reviews.title: Broken seat after a year
customer_reviews.text: Only got a year of use out of this kneeler before the hard plastic support between the rubber pads broke at each end. My husband is about 225lbs and while kneeling on it felt the surface collapse. And this was with intermittent use. Not every day/ every week. Will try taping it to get it to last the rest of the summer
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: We're completely redoing our backyard since it was overgrown with weeds, and this has come in so handy for the days I'm out pulling weeds for an hour at a time. No more achy feet and knees! My back still gets a little tight from bending over off of this, but nothing like when I was standing and bending. This is easy to move and fold, and the pockets for tools are super convenient. My only complaint is that the seat is super narrow. I'm not a big person, and there's not much room on this thing. Otherwise, love this.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Handy and quite useful with the proper cautions.
customer_reviews.text: Product is quite useful and performs as represented. I have used it for a variety of applications and am pleased to have it available. Folds and stores easily. Only caveats are that, when using as a kneeler and assisting from rising, both hands must apply pressure evenly or the item will flip. Same when using it as a stool, stay in the middle. Item is light and stores easily, I like having it to use... just needs a bit of common sense to be used safely. Weight limit should be a consideration.
customer_reviews.author: DD Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I had this item on my wish list. I planned on buying it for the end of season yard clean up. Constantly kneeling was wearing on my knees. Then I hurt my knee. What started out as a nicety ended up becoming a necessity. I was a little worried about the kneeler supporting my weight (200lbs +) but it held up like a champ. I was able to weed out the gardens and bushes with little fuss. And that was in the seated position. Once my knee heals I'm looking forward to trying the kneeling position.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality garden bench
customer_reviews.text: Great garden bench. I bought this for my.mother in law who loves to garden. She doesn't get around so good anymore. This bench really helps her out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kneeling
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to get up easily while kneeling to weed or work in my garden . The seat is very narrow and I am not big. You have to be careful not to lean back as you will topple. The velcro bag that attaches to arm is useless. The pouches are so narrow not much would fit. All in all it is what I needed so I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss P

customer_reviews.title: Great sitting bench for weedint!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right heighth for me sit on while I am weeding. It will replace the plastic one I have had for years. I am delighted! After back surgery I thought I would have to give this type of work up. This bench should make it easier for me to get up and down. I was loosing my balance with the other one. M. Parsons
customer_reviews.author: Peg's hobbies

customer_reviews.title: Gardening made easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm at the age where bending over to pull weeds, etc has gotten difficult. This wonderful garden kneeler makes the job so much easier. I can kneel on the pad and my knees are supported, and I have something to support me when I stand up. Using it as a bench provides me with support and balance as I can sit to reach and pull the weeds. This is our second one. We've had one for several years and decided it was time to have one for each of us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been losing strength in my legs for 3-4 years, getting up and down from the ground or floor is a major problems. I used the Garden Kneeler today and it was great! I was able to spend more time working because I didn't get so exhausted from trying to move around. I used the kneeling pad for sitting, that got me down where I needed to be and I was able to get up when needed without a lot of strain. I love the the tool bag, I had to put a rubber band on the handle bar. I'm thinking about making another pocket for my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: JanetSue

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and allows me to do more gardening which I love
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased with the garden kneeler and seat. Have trouble getting up and down due to arthritis and back problems but with the help from the seat handles, I can manage on my own in the yard now and can rest when I need to. I had a seat that rolled, but it was so low, I could not get up and down by myself. I also need to do a lot of gardening on my knees because I cannot bend due to rods in my back and the seat is comfortable to my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann Park

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mother who turned 90 years old today. She loves to garden but had some trouble getting up from a kneeling position. This product is PERFECT. She has also tried it in the house and she is able to get up easily using the handles. Special thanks to the seller who contacted me personally via email to make sure the product arrived and was what I wanted. Best customer service ever. You will not be disappointed with this product or this company.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Change from first review
customer_reviews.text: This product makes it much easier to get up after kneeling to pull weeds or work soil. The pad is not thick enough for my aged knees, but I found that folding a large bath towel in fourths does wonders. In my first review I said that I was using a kneeling pad to make it better. However, DO NOT use a larger pad. It moves around and you can take a headfirst tumble. I didn't, but it was close. I am very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lamoreaux

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I haven't used the tool holder yet, but have used the stool a lot. I have used both the kneeler and the seatand love how easy it is to switch between them. I have had pad kneelers before, this is worth the money. Would certainly buy again. Very sturdy to pull yourself back up when kneeling.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sloat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gardening for anyone, but a huge help for seniors with less flexibility and mobility.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gardened for 40 years and I find this kneeler with handles gives me the padding for being on my knees, and stability for getting up which isn’t as easy as it use to be. I love the pockets that Velcro on to keep my tools at hand. I don’t use the seat for sitting myself, but use it to set plantings on so I don’t have to bend down as far. As s heavier person, this is a sturdy piece and o can put my weight on the handles to get up and it holds strong and steady.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Product suits my purpose
customer_reviews.text: This product came fully assembled and I was able to use it straight from the packaging. I am 75 years old and have trouble getting to my feet from a kneeling position. This gives me enough assist to make it easier and possible. I wish it was a little sturdier but it does serve the purpose for which it is advertised. I use it for everything requiring me to kneel or be close to the ground. I have used it for gardening, cleaning baseboards, and cleaning lower cabinets, etc. Liked it so well, I bought a second one to give to a friend who has the same age related problems.
customer_reviews.author: r changup

customer_reviews.title: Great product for arthritic joints!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure this would benefit me since I have arthritic hips and knees. Amazing! I was able to spend extended amounts of time, 30 to 60 minutes, working in my flower gardens without any pain or stiffness. I really love the "handles" which make it much easier to get up after kneeling for such a long time. This Garden Kneeler has been so helpful and allows me to enjoy the outdoors and working/playing in the dirt or just sitting and enjoying the fragrances from the flowers. Highly recommend to anyone with joint issues.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Goldman

customer_reviews.title: A Life saver or should I say "Knee saver"!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Because of a bad knee I was not able to work around the garden; if I kneeled I could not get up on my own. I had to call on my wife to help me get up. Now with the ABCO Sport kneeler and seat I am again independent. Thanks for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Many useful applications
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it for any gardening and I use it for task around the house when I have to concentrate on a level making sense to either sit or kneel down. Many more applications for seniors.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Keeps my knees clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry in my motorhome to use when emptying the tanks and it works wonderful so I don't have to kneel on the ground and can use the handles to help me get back up. It also works as an extra seat if needed. Couldn't be happier with my purchase! It really solved a problem I had with not wanting to kneel on the ground around the septic dump stations.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic --a real body saver
customer_reviews.text: it was nice that it comes assembled. We've used it for both comfortable kneeling on a hard rough ceramic floor and as a comfortable and sturdy and steady seat for a building project. My wife and I are in our sixties and it's a real body saver!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I don't garden but when I had a total knee replacement, getting out of a lawn chair was difficult and I wanted to go see my grandson in soccer. I could carry this, it was light, and stop and sit if I needed a break. It's sturdy so I wasn't afraid to sit or get up with it and I got to see the soccer match. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Gardening Helper
customer_reviews.text: This garden seat/kneeler is everything as advertised, It folds easily for storage and is sturdy as a seat or kneeler. I use a small cushion when kneeling for extra comfort. The extras included are the tool caddy that attaches to the frame and a great pair of rubberized waterproof gloves that come with hard plastic finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: gramma

customer_reviews.title: Better for sitting than kneeling.
customer_reviews.text: Works best when sitting on it on in the high position. Feels like it wants to fold in a bit when in the kneeling position. This is because of the way the item folds. Foam is a little thin but all in all...works like it is supposed to. Extra accessories (gloves, pocket sleeve) are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: roland lapid

customer_reviews.title: Very handy little tool.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the garden but have used it inside a few times where I had to get down on the floor and getting up isn't as easy as it used to be. The frame is sturdy enough to assist getting off the floor. The pad is still hard on the knees - all garden pads are pretty firm. But it does exactly what it should. I haven't yet put the storage pouch on yet, so I can't rate that.
customer_reviews.author: LDAyres

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The side pocket is pretty much useless, so I’m making my own (both sides) from old jeans to have wider pockets for my phone and tools. No biggie since I sew. The bench however is very light weight so I take it with me throughout the garden with ease. It’s wide enough for comfort and the handles help me get up easier. I really love the purple/pink color too!
customer_reviews.author: L.F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden or anything else kneeler.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of kneeler for my garden for many, many years and it has finally bit the dust. I ordered yours hoping I would have the same help. It meets all my expectations. I have difficulty kneeling and need help to get up when I am down there getting out those weeds or planting. This kneeler is great and also love it as a seat to rest in between. Well made and great product. D.Dyer
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: The life saver bench
customer_reviews.text: Things is tha best 20.00$ I ever spent in my life. I mean it sincerely .i had 2major operations on my back & I'm suffering unimaginable pain on my hip. This bench is currently in my bathroom, ( its light weight, sturdy, the handles help to stand, & the right height at the counter). I thank god every day I bought it. Amen
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Mattioli

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: this is really a great tool to have. especially when you are older and need help getting up when kneeling down to do work. Husband even had it on the roof of his shed while putting the roof on. He needs help when getting up off his knees. He wonders why we waited so long to get this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Purchased for my father in law. He's hard to buy for. He started using this the next day! He gardens and works on semis so this has come in handy for him to take a rest. It's easy to fold and sturdy. Easy to store and take on jobs. Definitely an upgrade from the knee garden pad he was using.
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: A great garden bench for those with bad knees!
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried it in the yard. In the house I like the height, it is a little higher than the one I have. The seat is a little narrower than my old one, would be nice if it was a little wider for balance to work in the garden. With that little change, it would be a GREAT bench!
customer_reviews.author: Just plain me

customer_reviews.title: Great for gardening!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! Exactly as described. No assembly! VERY STURDY CONSTRUCTION! Folds flat for easy storage! Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey, CA

customer_reviews.title: You need this. Excellent gardening tool.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase so far. Serves its intended purpose well. My husband has his gardening simplified now. And I will be using it for cleaning and painting woodwork in the future. It's very sturdy and the padding is good. The tool pouch is very handy and the included gloves are nice. I will update my review when we use it more.
customer_reviews.author: MARKER56

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supportive foam cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The cushioning is supportive and doesn't bottom out. I do wish they made these things with a deeper seat. Maybe about three more inches. Then it would be more comfortable to sit on and work for a stretch of time. But it does the job nicely as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is useful purchase that is reasonably priced. Good for us as we have more aches and pains kneeling and sitting on the ground for gardening.
customer_reviews.author: James Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: This little seat is really useful. I have a severe knee injury and it helps me stand back up without hurting the knee. Two warnings: the seat must be on level ground or you will tip over and you'll have develop some upper body strength if you want to avoid putting too much weight on a leg injury The stool is sturdy, easy to store and over all a good, useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable padded stool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother to see if it helps her bad knees while she works in her back yard. She told me that she really likes it and it was easy to use. She liked how she was able to use the legs as support as she gets up. She said it has good padding
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Dossett

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I've gone this long without one of these!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the stool primarily as a seat rather than a kneeler, but as such, it not only has made tending my raised beds so much easier but also has made many household tasks easier too. I keep it by the back door so that it can go out to the garden with me or be grabbed quickly when reorganizing a cupboard or cleaning low surfaces. The seat is wide enough and stable enough to accommodate my 250 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A.

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this! I bought one for my husband and myself because it is getting harder on our knees to get up from a kneeling position! Looking at it I thought, how in the world can this be safe and helpful! Well, it has made the biggest difference in our lives. Plus, I was talking to my elderly relatives who tend to fall a lot... and struggle to get back up. I sent one to them and they called raving that the kneeler has changed their lives! I highly recommend this item to anyone struggling with aging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for all !
customer_reviews.text: Love this! A must for all Gardeners! Come in so handy for so many things, my back and knees are much happier now when I head to the yard. Have even used it in the house when needed a little stool to sit on. You won't regret buying it!
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the second garden bench I've ordered. I actually wore out the first one. It was great for working in the garden and avoiding kneeling. When this unit arrived, the gloves that were supposed to come with it weren't there. However, the manufacturer quickly sent me a replacement, and gave great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Air Force

customer_reviews.title: Good seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandma while she works in the garden, she says the seat is nice but to pull the legs out and lock them into place is slightly difficult for her to do. She said that the seat works great and since it is pretty light weight it is easy to move around in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Erica V

customer_reviews.title: THE best
customer_reviews.text: Good all around bench, not just for gardening. I used mine to sit on in the garage and paint a little piece of furniture. The gloves and cloth caddy included are a great idea. If you have any trouble getting up and down or a bad back like me, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Work in Progress
customer_reviews.text: The kneeler seems quite sturdy, large, etc. If I have any problems with it, they would be with the height. However, I realize that something cannot be perfect for all people - we are all built differently. I am anxious to try it out in the garden and I may change my tune about the height.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Lane

customer_reviews.title: a
customer_reviews.text: Yossi, It works: easy down and easy up. Just what is required for "whenever" gardeners. I look forward to fall planting, pruning, and unsightly root removal. It should all be easier now. I also plan to use my workout mat for closer work. More after September planned preparation and planting. Thanks. Herb
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Knee Savers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device for those of us who garden or do any "low" work despite having sore knees. We use it all the time. It's study, but not too heavy, and the mechanism to lock and unlock the "arms" works well.
customer_reviews.author: GKC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful when used to work from your knees
customer_reviews.text: Five stars if it were a little shorter. Wonderful when used to work from your knees. To sit on....too tall. I cut 6.5" out of the middle it and it made a world of difference. Excepting the height, which may just be me, it is a beautifully designed and constructed unit. First class! Will make a great gift and I'll do so happily.
customer_reviews.author: shuuto

customer_reviews.title: Great with a”but”!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece for my husband. Overall, he loves the construction and materials, and it’s easy to use - but - the pouch is almost useless, it doesn’t do well holding the tools (to small), and there is no place for the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to use to work in the garden and also to use inside for jobs where I needed to sit to protect my old back. This fits both bills. Love the fast service and the high quality product. Very sturdy and easy to close for carrying and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher905

customer_reviews.title: Love my bench
customer_reviews.text: I love my bench!! It is easy to use and I really love the fact that you can use it two ways!! I especially like the fact that you can sit to work on flowers and shrubs! So far it seems sturdy and I hope it lasts several years
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: The framework between the pads will break.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Bought one for $19 on a Chinese website. The support structure did fail between the pads. The structure is a fibrous?, x-bracing? material; the only non-metal material on the unit. Hoped the $35 best buy from Amazon would have a better structure but turned out exactly the same. Don't have much hope for it. Loved the Kneeler until it broke. Can't rate it higher since I'm certain this one will fail as well.
customer_reviews.author: scotchtradr

customer_reviews.title: Kneeler is sturdy and works well, but take care using your arms and shoulders when rising from kneeling position.
customer_reviews.text: I love my kneeler! I've used it several times to get up from kneeling position and it works great. When you have to kneel to do a task that is very low or close to the floor, the kneeler does keep you a little too high off the floor, but for most things, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Much better attachment for sweating pad
customer_reviews.text: Structurally sound. Similar to my old one whose seat/kneeling pad broke. Much better attachment for sweating pad! I wish the frame/legs had the thick, VERY durable plastic caps at the bends...to save the wear on the metal. I had my old one for more than ten years, and the plastic caps are still intact. I will need to add something to extend the life of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Forbes

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sturdy seat/kneeler.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy item. So glad I finally bought one - been thinking about it for a while and not willing to admit I need one! I've used it constantly when doing my spring gardening. (P.S. don't bother ordering because of the extra item of the gloves - they are useless)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The product collapsed the first time I used it causing me to fall backwards! It is poorly made and I would not recommending purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for working in the flower gardens
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as a Christmas present ,she loves the it and is looking forward to using it this coming garden season.
customer_reviews.author: RonZo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very helpful. Saves my knees and back while gardening.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, one for my mom and one for me. It has made a huge difference in weeding and gardening. The handles make it easier to get up from planting, especially if you have bad knees. I love being able to use it both ways. Very light weight and easy to store. I definitely recommend this product. Great in dirt, grass or rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Ellis, Las Vegas, NV

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My getting older body would not be able to be in the garden as much as I want without this bench/kneeler. I use it both ways nearly every time I'm playing in the dirt. It's sturdy and yet lightweight. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great knelling pad.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Sturdy and well built. The knee pad is comfortable and the right height for working on the ground. I have to use the handrails to get up and the sturdiness I feel makes me confident it won't collapse under me.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: So pleased to save my knees
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product a few times as I got it for Christmas and it has only been nice out in the garden these past few days (end of January). I simply love how it works and saves my knees. It helps me stand up more easily too as I am now 74 and while in good shape for my age find standing up without help hard on my thigh muscles in particualar. This will save my bacon as I am constantly down weeding and planting through the warmer seasons. So glad a friend introduced me to them.
customer_reviews.author: Gaynor Hintz

customer_reviews.title: I have found it useful for weeding my flower bed and cleaning my bath ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built and designed product for gardeners who might have difficulty with getting up fro those activities requiring kneeling. I have only used it for a very short time. I have found it useful for weeding my flower bed and cleaning my bath tub. I am sure I will find other uses as well. For those with sensitive knees, padding of some sort may be called for for some tasks. As for seating, buyers would do well to check the height of the seat for their own body fit. Also, check the tool attachment if buying for a particular purpose. Folds up nicely, so great for carrying and storage! Nee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves the day
customer_reviews.text: I am retired and have bad knees so I use it mostly as a portable seat and it works very well. It is comfortable and the handles make it easy to get up I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: richard sommerfeld

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product!!! Since my knee replacement 3 years ago, I've been very limited in getting up and down for even simple things like cleaning the bathtub or shower stall, weeding the garden or even reaching into low deep cupboards in the kitchen. But not anymore since your "kneeler" arrived. I am using it inside and outside and I can do it all. Thank you so much for such a simple, lightweight and fabulous product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roney

customer_reviews.title: I love this Kneeler
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kneeler. I am disabled and I use it to get up when I get down on my knees. I also use it when I am in the yard for the seat. Actually purchased for the wife but I use it more than she does. I purchased one for a friend also and he thinks it is great. What a handy item. I highly recommend this product if you kneel on your knees or work in your yard.. You won't regret buying it..
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Gardening Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the handles that help me get up from the kneeling position. The sitting position is great while deadheading some of the taller flowers. Super easy to fold and unfold. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: GAL

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I saw this somewhere and then saw Amazon sold them. My older wife works out in the yard and at first thought it was an unnecessary splurge. Now that she's had it almost a month she really likes it and it makes her yard work much easier as well as a nice bench to just sit under the sun in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Koenn

customer_reviews.title: ... third one of these I have owned and I love 'em. Not only are they good in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have owned and I love 'em. Not only are they good in the garden but inside the house as well especially if you are a bit older and getting up and getting down is becoming a problem. We consider them a real necessity. Also, they are heavy duty, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim  Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: A Gardener’s Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who became an avid gardener when he retired. At the end of the day, he complained of his back & knees hurting. He really appreciates that I got this for him as it accomplishes more & is in less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have bilateral knee replacements so I added memory expected to need to do that. It is very sturdy when used on gentle slope.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Argentos

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to keep it. I have a handicap and my kneeler is strictly for sitting on. This one is not tall enough, the seat isn't substantial enough, and, for me, it needs to be a little more stable. For anyone else, I'm sure it would be just fine. It looks well built and is really a nice kneeler. Unfortunately, my bad leg prevents me from getting up from this height.
customer_reviews.author: happyreader

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as replacement for an item that got lost during a recent move. My husband says this kneeler/seat is even better than the one we lost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support you kneeling
customer_reviews.text: Why use just a couple of screws in a plastic frame to hold in place a surface you're going to kneel on. It doesn't work. I'm keeping it but need to retrofit it with reinforcement supports to hold the pad from sinking.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce T. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 70 year old dad for Christmas- said it was the best present he ever got. He has had two back surgeries, had bone removed from his hip, shattered his foot, and suffers from arthritis, but loves to work in his garden. This kneeler/seat has made one of his favorite past times so much easier on his joints and makes it easier to navigate in his personal backyard jungle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Seems Saturday and helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but seems to be sturdy. I had a knee replacement 3 years so it’s hard to kneel on the floor. Thinking this will help be be able to bath the dog in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. It helps me to do my yard work
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It helps me to do my yard work, and I can hold on to it doing it. The best thing is about it, I can get up from kneeling much easier. The item came on time, the package was is a good condition. The customer service was excellent, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Knausz

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for my needs. Not gardening but I do work from a kneeling position a lot. As I get older tools like this pad are great. Not sure how long it will hold up to my wheight, over 200 pounds, but thus far so good.
customer_reviews.author: slide112

customer_reviews.title: Just what us old folks need
customer_reviews.text: When you hit 80 you do have a problem getting up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Garden Kneeler And Seat - Protects Your Knees, Clothes From Dirt & Grass Stains - Foldable Stool For Ease Of Storage - EVA Foam Pad - Sturdy and Lightweight - Bench Comes With A Free Tool Pouch!
feature_bullets: GARDEN KNEELING MADE EASY – Abcosport deep-seat garden kneeler makes it quite convenient for you to kneel down in your garden without hurting your knees or back. Whether it’s weeding, seeding, planting or any other operation that requires kneeling in the garden, either you hurt your knees or back, or soil/stain your clothes in the dirt/grass. This garden kneeler comes with a soft foam padding to provide cushion to your knees and help protect them and your clothing too.

STRONG METALLIC FRAME – The strong metallic frame not only imparts it strength and durability but also provides the support to your hands and back for kneeling down and standing up. No more do you need to put your palms on the grass to get up – simply hold the handles and lower or rise comfortably innumerable times. Despite being strong, it’s extremely lightweight and easy to carry around.

DOUBLES AS A SEAT – The kneeler can be flipped over to convert it into a comfortable seat that can help you sit and relax for a while when tired from gardening activities, and is even perfect for enjoying a cup of tea in the garden. These incredible features make it an ideal gift for anyone who loves gardening a lot and you bet a true gardener is gonna thank you hundred times for this invaluable gift.

EASY TO STORE AND SUPERIOR QUALITY – The kneeler can also be folded flat in just a blink – this makes it even more convenient to carry around and store. The folded kneeler occupies very little space and can be carried even in your car for an outing. The kneeler cum seat is made up of all superior quality materials to ensure a long life and functional effectiveness.

FREE BONUS AND 100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – Not only do you get this incredible gardening accessory at the best price but also a free tool pouch for carrying around important gardening tools. In addition, you also get a 100% risk-free satisfaction guarantee to let you buy with confidence; no questions asked.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,835 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
